transcript: there is no perfect partner well there's also no perfect career I resent the passion thing sets too high of a bar and so I think it's really about like lots of action and then all of a sudden you get good at whatever the thing is and then you like it and then you find your passion you didn't find your passion you created it it sounds the same thing with like romantic partners for a lot of younger people there's so many fish in the sea there's so many swipe rights that you're looking for this perfect key or this perfect lock and it's just not like that everything has elements that you don't want and I think the expectation that everything is going to work out makes it so that nothing does for most people
